roleset.name: to catch shrimp
roleset.note: SHRIMP-V NOTES: frame by Perryn. Member of Vncls berry-13.7. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from shrimp.01-v)

roles.note: I don't think arg2 is going to appear. (from shrimp.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Much of the brawling by Stewart and his henchmen was against the local Cajuns who-1 *trace*-1 fished and shrimped for a living.

example.name: with arg1
example.text: Well, me mate Adam who teaches across the hall from me showed up at about 07:00 and we put in at Eagle Harbor ramp, and ran to the Dr. Lake bridge and shrimped for bait for a while .

example.name: with beneficiary
example.text: Finally, Phi Nguyen bought a boat of his own, and for the next five years he shrimped for himself.
